name: Airbus A319
danger_areas: Intake: 4.5m. Exhaust: 50m. APU: Aft Tail Cone.
description: Min 7,900L water. Discharge: 3,000 L/min. Focus on overwing exits for rapid egress; ensure slides are disarmed.

name: Airbus A320
danger_areas: Intake: 4.5m. Exhaust: 50m. APU: Aft Right.
cutting_points: Marked corners fwd and aft of wing root.
description: Min 7,900L water. Discharge: 3,000 L/min. High-pressure oxygen bottles in forward cargo hold.

name: Airbus A321
danger_areas: Intake: 5m. Exhaust: 60m. APU: Aft Right.
cutting_points: Marked areas between L1/L2 and R3/R4.
description: Min 12,100L water. Discharge: 5,300 L/min. Stretched fuselage hazard; center-tank fire risk.

name: Airbus A380
danger_areas: Intake: 10m (Idle). Exhaust: 100m. Upper deck height hazard.
cutting_points: Limited. GLARE skin requires specialized rescue saws.
description: Min 32,300L water. Discharge: 11,200 L/min. Double-deck hazard. GLARE skin fire-resistant.

name: Boeing 747-8F
danger_areas: Intake: 10m. Exhaust: 80m. APU: Tail Center.
cutting_points: No windows on main deck. Use upper deck hatch or nose cargo door.
description: Freighter config. Primary rescue via upper deck. Avoid windowless main deck skin.

name: Boeing 767-300
danger_areas: Intake: 6m. Exhaust: 60m. APU: Aft.
cutting_points: Standard marked corners between doors 1 and 2.
description: Min 18,200L water. Discharge: 7,200 L/min. Widebody narrow-aisle; dual-lane slides.

name: Boeing 777-200
danger_areas: Intake: 8m (Extreme Suction). Exhaust: 75m. APU: Aft.
cutting_points: Specific 50cm squares marked 'CUT HERE' near door frames.
description: Min 24,300L water. Twin-engine long-range widebody. Large fuel volume in wing tanks.

name: Beechcraft King Air
danger_areas: Propeller Arc: 5m Standoff. Engine Exhaust: High Temp.
cutting_points: Thin aluminum skin; entry possible anywhere clear of spar.
description: Min 1,200L water. Discharge: 820 L/min. Rotating propellers. Master in overhead.

name: Douglas DC-3
danger_areas: Propeller Arc: 5m. Tail-dragger configuration (sloped floor).
cutting_points: Avoid main wing spar (center fuselage floor line).
description: Risk of fuel spill from carburetors. Magnesium engine components possible.

name: Airbus EC 135 (Juno)
danger_areas: Main Rotor: Low clearance. Fenestron Tail: High velocity air.
cutting_points: Plexiglass windows are primary entry. Composite frame.
description: H1 Category. Min 744L water. Discharge: 372 Lpm. Rear clamshell doors for stretchers.

name: Poseidon (P-8A)
danger_areas: Intake: 6m. Exhaust: 60m. Sonobuoy chutes. Radar RF Hazard.
cutting_points: Marked corners fwd/aft of wing. Avoid Weapon Bay behind wing root.
description: Individual Category: 7. Min 12,100L water. Maritime ASW based on 737-800.

name: NH90 Bundesmarine
danger_areas: Main Rotor. High-speed Tail Rotor. Engine Exhaust (Top).
cutting_points: Plexiglass or rear ramp. Composite skin hazard if burning.
description: Heliport Category: H2. Min 1,291L water. Discharge: 1,138 Lpm. Full composite.

name: Atlas (A400M)
danger_areas: Propeller Arc: 20ft (Composite fragments). APU: Right wheel well.
description: Category: 8. Min 18,200L water. Counter-rotating composite propellers.

name: C-17 Globemaster III
danger_areas: Intake: 20ft. Exhaust: 150ft. Reverse Thrust blast.
description: Category: 8. Min 18,060L water. Strategic Transport. Rear ramp is primary egress.

name: Hercules (C-130J)
danger_areas: Propeller Arc: 15ft. High-pressure tires. APU: Left fwd.
description: Category: 6. Min 7,900L water. Tactical Airlifter. Defensive flare hazard.

name: Voyager (A330 MRTT)
danger_areas: Fuel Pod Venting. Intake: 20ft. APU: Aft.
description: Category: 8. Min 19,380L water. Discharge: 7,690 Lpm. Massive fuel load.

name: Apache (AH-64D)
danger_areas: Rotor clearance. Auto-tracking cannon. Radar RF Hazard.
description: Heliport Category: H3. Min 1,600L water. Attack Heli. Explosive canopy.

name: F-35 Lightning II
danger_areas: Intake: 15ft. Hot Surface: Stealth Coating. Exhaust: 100ft.
description: Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. CFRP dust hazard if burning.

name: Typhoon
danger_areas: Ventral Intake Suction. Pod RF. Hot APU left side.
description: Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. Carbon fiber and LOX hazards.

name: B-2 Spirit
danger_areas: Invisible hot exhaust. Toxic Stealth RAM (if burning).
description: Stealth Bomber. Category: 9. Min 9,357L water. Undertside egress.

name: F-22 Raptor
danger_areas: Intake: 15ft. Vectoring heat. Radar RF Hazard.
description: Air Superiority. Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. OBOGS hazard.

name: F-16 Fighting Falcon
danger_areas: Intake: 15ft. Hydrazine (H-70) Tank: Right side.
description: Multi-role. Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. Toxic Hydrazine hazard.

name: F-15 Eagle
danger_areas: Intake: 15ft. LOX Venting. Twin engine heat.
description: Air Superiority. Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. Live missiles.

name: Saab JAS 39 Gripen
danger_areas: Intake: 10ft. Canard movement. Wing-tip sensors.
description: Multi-role. Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. High composite airframe.

name: Dassault Rafale M
danger_areas: Intake: 12ft. Hook tension. Magnesium wheel hazard.
description: Carrier-based. Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. Catapult hardware hazard.

name: Mirage 2000
danger_areas: Intake: 10ft. Single engine blast. Trailing heat.
description: Delta-wing. Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. Turbine failure fragments risk.

name: MiG-29 Fulcrum
danger_areas: Intake Suction. High-power K-36 Ejector seat.
description: Front-line fighter. Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. Twin-engine hazard.

name: Embraer KC-390
danger_areas: Intake: 15ft. LOX System. High T-tail movement.
description: Multi-mission. Rear ramp egress. Fly-by-wire.

name: CH-47 Chinook
danger_areas: Tandem Rotors: 30ft. Low-swinging blades. Top deck heat.
description: Heliport Category: H3. Min 3,585L water. Discharge: 1,793 Lpm.

name: V-22 Osprey
danger_areas: Proprotor Arc: 30ft. Downwash. Nacelle heat.
description: Tiltrotor. Min 1,848L water. Discharge: 924 Lpm. Approach hazard.

name: E-7 Wedgetail
danger_areas: Radar RF Radiation. Center top fuselage entry restriction.
description: Category: 6. Min 8,332L water. Discharge: 4,162 Lpm. AEW&C.

name: Airseeker (RC-135W)
danger_areas: High Intensity RF. Cooling vents. Intake Suction.
description: Category: 7. Min 12,100L water. SIGINT. High-density mission cabin.

name: BAe Hawk
danger_areas: Intake: 10ft. Canopy Jettison. MK10 Seat hazard.
description: Category: 3. Min 1,200L water. Jet trainer. Explosive canopy.

name: Lynx Wildcat
danger_areas: Main Rotor. Composite tail boom (toxic dust).
description: Heliport Category: H3. Min 1,600L water. Multi-role Heli.

name: Grob Tutor
danger_areas: Propeller Arc: 10ft. Manual slide canopy.
description: Category: 1. Min 364L water. Discharge: 364 Lpm. Fully composite.

name: Protector RG1
danger_areas: Aft Propeller. SATCOM RF Hazard. Ordnance arc.
description: MALE RPAS. Risk assessed fire cover required.

name: F/A-18 Hornet
danger_areas: Intake: 15ft. Hook. Tip ordnance. Magnesium wheels.
description: Category: 5. Min 5,400L water. Carrier Fighter hazards.

name: AIM-9M Sidewinder
danger_areas: Seeker sensitivity. Rear blast: 100ft.
description: IR Guided. Toxic smoke. Fragmentation on cook-off.

name: GBU-31 JDAM
danger_areas: Evacuation: 1000m. Thermal Cook-off risk.
description: GPS Guided. Extreme explosive hazard. Evacuate if burning.

name: Storm Shadow
danger_areas: Turbojet Exhaust. JP-10 Fuel Leak. Blast zone.
description: Cruise Missile. Dual-stage BROACH warhead.

name: AGM-114 Hellfire
danger_areas: Shape Charge: 50m Front. Rocket Motor: 100m Rear.
description: Anti-Armor. Shape-charge jet hazard. High velocity motor.

name: Paveway II/III
danger_areas: Sharp Guidance Fins. Frag radius: 500m+.
description: Laser Guided Bomb. High fragmentation hazard.
